message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $125? It's a great deal for a product you value at $150.
I'm getting close to your offer, Alice. How about we try $122? I'm willing to meet you halfway between our prices.
